turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about PriyoShop.com.
turn.2: PriyoShop.com PriyoShop.com is a Bangladeshi e-commerce platform, headquartered in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
turn.3: When did the company start its operation?
turn.4: The company started its operation on February 2013.
turn.6: PriyoShop.com is a B2C platform following the market place model.
turn.7: What kind of goods does the company sell?
turn.8: It has been retailing a wide range of electronic and lifestyle products such as - clothing, footwear, jewelry, accessories, electronics, appliance, health care, beauty products etc.
turn.10: PriyoShop was founded by Asikul Alam Khan.
